description:
The "nova show" command prints a table that has a row "fault" which shows instance fault information if there was an error building the instance. Ordinarily, the fault row contains a few fields: message, code, and created. For an admin user, it is supposed to show an additional field: details.

This functionality is currently broken as an admin user still cannot see instance fault field: details in the printed table when the "nova show" command is run.
title: 'nova show' not showing instance fault 'details' for admin
